name: Into the Depths (kovalok)
description:
Shoot sharks and collect treasures with your submarine. Done during JGDGJ. Use your claw to bring treasures back to the hangar. Use radar to navigate through the underwater caverns. Red pin points to the treasure and green points to the hangar. But be careful your radar battery runs out pretty quickly. Gather more battery from dead sharks. If you lose your treasure you can go back to hangar without it.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Lift/Drop claw: Up and Down arrows

Open claw: Left arrow

Close claw: Right arrow

Gun: Space

Missile: Left shift

Toggle Radar: E

Mute: M

Quit: ESC
